name: Gearkeeper Construct
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The gearkeeper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Rapid Shifting
entries: Opportunity attacks made against the gearkeeper have disadvantage.

trait.name: Whirling Blades
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the gearkeeper takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gearkeeper makes two Arm Blade attacks, or one Arm Blade attack and one Spear Launcher attack.

action.name: Arm Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear Launcher
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 90 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Shrapnel Blast {@recharge}
entries: The gearkeeper jettisons a spray of jagged metal in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
